bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 169, Number 52 (Wednesday, March 22, 2023)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. NEGUSE:H.R. 1717.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article I, Section 8The single subject of this legislation is:Establish an interagency task force between the U.S. Patentand Trademark Office and the Food and Drug Administration forpurposes of sharing information with respect to patents.[Page H1329]

item.title: Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2023

latestAction.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 18.

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.title: Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2023

item.title: Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2023
Interagency Patent Coordination and Improvement Act of 2023

To amend title 35, United States Code, to establish an interagency task force between the United States Patent and Trademark Office and the Food and Drug Administration for purposes of sharing information and providing technical assistance with respect to patents, and for other purposes.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
